qas.question: What type of school has Tuvalu set up on each atoll?
What from of education do Community Training Centres provide?
For what have CTC students failed to qualify ?
Besides children, who can Take CTC  classes?
What kind of training classes are offered at CTC?

context: <a0_0>Community Training Centres<a0_0/> (CTCs) have been established within the primary schools on each atoll. The CTCs provide <a1_0>vocational training<a1_0/> to students who do not progress beyond Class 8 because they failed the entry qualifications for <a2_0>secondary education<a2_0/>. The CTCs offer training in <a4_0>basic<a4_0/> carpentry, gardening and farming, sewing and cooking. At the end of their studies the graduates can apply to continue studies either at Motufoua Secondary School or the Tuvalu Maritime Training Institute (TMTI). <a3_0>Adults<a3_0/> can also attend courses at the CTCs.
